Counter.PluginDescription: Plugin that display an image counter with the site visits and page hits.
Counter.Remove: Are you sure you want to remove the counter?
Counter.Remove_error: An error occurred while removing the counter!
Counter.Params_site_desc: Select a site to which you want to create a counter. You cannot create multiple counters for the same site!
Counter.Params_sitename_desc: Sitename that displayed at the first row. You can leave this field blank. Due to the limitation of the GD2 library, you cannot use in the sitename characters other than Latin. Turn off the site name and write it in Photoshop or in any other image editor.
Counter.Params_sitename_pos_label: Location of label with the name of the site
Counter.Params_visitors_pos_label: Location of label with the number of visits
Counter.Params_views_pos_label: Location of label with the number of hits
Counter.Params_visitors_pos_desc: The upper left corner of the label will be placed on these coordinates.
Counter.Params_img_size_desc: Image size - width and height respectively.
Counter.Params_img_path_desc: Path to the image. Absolute path. The only supported types png and gif
Counter.Params_datestart_desc:
Date from which will start counting visits. To compute all visits set the date when piwik was installed or date when site was added. Format - year-month-day
For example - 2000-01-01
If both fields are left blank, the date will be taken from the parameter date in the url.
Counter.Params_token_auth_desc: The token of a user with view (preview) rights. If you do not specify, then piwik report an error, and the counter will be zero. You can also create additional users and assign the appropriate rights.
Counter.Params_fontpath_desc: Font filepath for font in TrueType format. Absolute path.
Counter.Params_pos_sep_sitename: Label with the name of the site
Counter.Params_pos_sep_visits: Label with the number of visits
Counter.Params_pos_sep_hits: Label with the number of hits
Counter.Params_show_sitename: Show the name of the site
Counter.Params_colors_sitename: Color of label with the name of the site
Counter.Params_colors_visits: Color of label with the number of visits
Counter.Params_colors_views: Color of label with the number of hits
Counter.Params_cache_clear_q: Do you really want to clear the cache?
Counter.Params_cache_clear_error: An error occurred while clearing the cache! Cache is allready cleared or something went wrong.
Counter.Params_cache_time_desc: When a period is selected from the list below, the cache is not less than the minimum value.
Counter.Path_empty: Path is empty or is invalid!
Counter.Preview_notice: To create a new image, it may take some time.
Counter.Counter_exists: The counter for that site already exists!
Counter.Params_cache_off: Not recommended to disable if you have not set up auto archiving of logs in cron.
Counter.Params_live_period: Return data for last N minutes
Counter.Params_live_interval: Check interval for get updated data in msec
Counter.Params_live_interval_desc: Minimum time is set to 10 seconds
Counter.Params_tpl_by_countries: Custom template for "visitors by countries" data
Counter.Params_tpl_by_countries_desc:
Allowed tags are:
[nb_visits] - total number of visits;
[nb_actions] - total number of pageviews;
[nb_countries] - total number of countries. For visits, pageviews and countries you can use custom offset like [nb_actions offset="+200"] or [nb_actions offset="-10"]
[date start="2012-02-23" format="F j, Y"] - start date. Can have three attributes - 'start', 'end', 'format'. 'start' and 'end' - date range. 'format' - how to format resulting date(see PHP date()). If 'start' and/or 'end' ommited when start - default start date(see above) and 'end' - current date.
Data provided by this template is always static and updated only when viewing admin dashboard or triggering archiving. Leave this field blank if you don't want to use him.
Counter.Params_live_static_desc: If set to "Yes" when script request data from server only when user request that page. Otherwise, the script will check the data at specified interval.
Counter.Footer_found_err: Found a bug in the plugin?
